data.caption:
Latin America’s recycling industry is evolving fast, and Zato is ready to lead the way at Residuos Expo exhibition!

As specialists in metal shredding, demolition and recovery, we design and produce cutting-edge hammermills, pre-shredders,  scrap shears and scrap cleaning plants to transform waste into valuable resources.

Join us from March 25th - 27th at stand 1718 and discover how our technology can help your business' circular economy!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment
#MetalRecycling #ResiduosExpo2025

Have you ever wondered what happens after you order a Zato solution?

That's when Michela, Letizia and Elisa step in! From processing the request to coordinating with production and logistics, they make sure every order goes smoothly. Their precision and dedication ensure a seamless experience from budget quote to final delivery.

Because great machines deserve great service—meet the team making it happen!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #ZatoTeam #BackOffice

Why settle for less when the Blue Shark 12.10 FP delivers more?

Compact yet powerful, this hammer mill is engineered for top-tier performance in shredding ferrous and nonferrous metals. Its robust construction and smart controls make it durable, easy to maintain and incredibly efficient in even the most demanding conditions.

Let Blue Shark help you increase productivity: visit our website to find out more at LINK in BIO 🔗

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #BlueShark #Hammermill

Are fire extinguishers and previously bonified gas tanks dangerous to dispose of? With Zato, not anymore!

The Blue Devil shredder prevent explosions, ensure operator safety, while increasing efficiency and reducing costs.

Watch the full video!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #TwinShaftShredder #BlueDevil

Can a pre-shredder make you feel safer? ⚠️

Absolutely! The Blue Devil acts just like a true 'Guardian Angel', preventing dangerous explosions caused by, previously bonified, gas tanks. Its open design keeps your team safe and your operations running smoothly, avoiding costly downtime and damage.

Choose safety, choose Zato. Discover more about Blue Devil now! 🔗♻️

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #TwinShaftShredder #BlueDevil

Bulky scrap piles, mixed materials, and costly inefficiencies—common struggles in the recycling world.

At a French customer's facility, the Zato Blue Devil twin-shaft shredder turned challenges into solutions, delivering cleaner separation, reduced volume, and optimised processes.

Watch the full video to see how Blue Devil increases efficiency!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #TwinShaftShredder #BlueDevil

It’s the perfect season to recycle joy, reuse kindness and spread the holiday spirit! 💫

As 2024 wraps up, we want to celebrate the success and connections we’ve shared. From all of us at Zato, we wish you a joyful holiday season and look forward to a greener, brighter future.

Happy Holidays!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment

Meet Wilma, Hanan, and Jenny—the powerhouse trio behind Zato’s Marketing Team! 🌟📈

From building brand awareness, managing digital platforms to organising industry events, they work tirelessly to showcase Zato’s innovation and connect us with clients worldwide. Their creativity and dedication keep Zato at the forefront of the recycling industry.

Stay connected for more updates about our amazing team!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #ZatoTeam #Marketing

Precision, care, and quality — meet the team that brings Zato’s solutions to life!

Our Production Team in Prevalle assembles each component with attention, ensuring the highest standards of durability and efficiency. From rigorous testing to fast delivery, they handle it all, making sure every product is ready to meet our clients' needs worldwide.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #Recyclingsolutions #ZatoTeam #Production

Zato’s advanced shredding system takes the stage at Access Recycling!

From the powerful Blue Devil pre-shredder to the fully automated 1,200 HP Blue Shark hammer mill and Blue Sorter, this setup truly transforms scrap processing—boosting efficiency, reducing downtime and enhancing safety.

Watch the full video and see how it is bringing big results to this Australian company!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #TwinShaftShredder

Today is America Recycles Day—a day that reminds us that every little action counts. 

This initiative inspires us all to rethink our choices, learn to recycle correctly and pave the way for a cleaner, brighter future. At Zato, we echo this commitment through solutions that improve and increase the recycling of ferrous and non-ferrous materials.

A sustainable tomorrow is possible and starts with the choices we make every day.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #AmericaRecyclesDay #Sustainability

Are you interested in the world of ferrous and non-ferrous metal recycling systems? Join ZATO at pollutec_fr Paris exhibition!

📍 Stand E041
🌎 Paris, France
📆 26-27 November

Discover Zato's complete range of shredding machines and plants, designed to help your company become greener.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #PollutecParis

Powerful, precise, and built to last—meet the Cayman RB!

Designed to effortlessly cut railway and tramway rails, it guarantees maximum efficiency with its high-quality components and innovative design. Compact, durable, and easy to maintain, it’s the perfect solution for the recycling sector.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment

Have you ever seen 78 blades working in perfect harmony? Now you can—with our Blue Storm!

This twin-shaft shredder is engineered to process light scrap with precision, optimizing density and cutting down processing costs. A hydraulic 4-motor drive and interchangeable blades ensure peak performance for ferrous, non-ferrous, and WEEE materials.

Crush the competition - find out more at the LINK in BIO 🔗

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #BlueStorm #TwinShaftShredder

Too much volume, too little efficiency? Managing thin but bulky hot forming automotive scrap is a real challenge—especially when transport inefficiencies drive up costs.

In Munich, Zato’s Blue Devil twin-shaft shredder provided an effective solution to this issue. By reducing size and increasing density, it streamlines logistics, cuts costs, and maximizes efficiency.

See the shredder in action—watch the video!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #MetalRecycling #BlueDevil

White goods don’t belong in landfills—they belong back in the production cycle!

With the right process, fridges, washing machines, and dishwashers can turn into valuable secondary raw materials. But first, they must be properly treated. Zato’s technology ensures safe and efficient recovery of steel, aluminum and copper transforming waste into new resources.

Upgrade your white goods recycling today!
	
#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #WhiteGoodsRecycling  #TwinShaftShredder #HammerMills #SeparationLines

What does it take to build a Zato machine? More than just cutting-edge engineering—it starts with the right materials.

That’s where Tiziano, Marzia, Alberto and Sara come in! From selecting reliable suppliers to ensuring every component meets our high standards, they make sure that nothing is left to chance. Every bolt, sheet, and part is carefully sourced to keep Zato machines performing at their best.

Stay connected for more updates about our team!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #ZatoTeam

Our Cayman demolition shears tackle HMS 1 with clean, powerful cuts — combining  technology and strength for top-tier performance in scrap processing.

Discover the full Cayman range on our website 👆 link in bio

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #HMS1 #Cayman #DemolitionShears

Old appliances may be heavy and complex—but inside, they’re packed with value.

At a specialised facility in Spain, end-of-life white goods like fridges and washing machines are transformed into high-quality scrap. How? With Zato’s Blue Devil, Blue Shark and Blue Sorter working in perfect sync.

Watch how white goods go from bulky waste to valuable resources!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #WhiteGoodsRecycling  #TwinShaftShredder #HammerMills #SeparationLines

Ready for the biggest event in the recycled materials industry? Zato is heading to San Diego for we_are_rema 2025!

We’ll be there, with thousands of professionals from around the world, to showcase our extensive range of equipment for recycling both ferrous and non-ferrous metals.

Come see how we turn industry challenges into opportunities. Visit us at Stand 415 – San Diego Convention Center.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #ReMA2025

Safety is built into everything we do — not just our machines.

This World Day for Safety and Health at Work reminds us that protecting our teams means protecting everything we build. Every phase of our operations — from design and production to after-sales — is shaped by a daily commitment to creating safer, healthier workplaces.

Because true innovation begins by protecting the people behind it. Learn more in our Compliance section: link in Bio!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #SafetyWork

In Slovakia our performance speaks louder than words.
Mixed scrap doesn’t stand a chance against Zato’s power and precision.

Watch the Blue Devil in action now! Full video at link in Bio.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #BlueDevil

Aluminium profiles, Danish setting, Zato power. The Blue Devil shows its strength where it matters most — delivering clean cuts, high efficiency, and unbeatable performance in aluminium recycling.

Watch the video to see it for yourself!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #BlueDevil #TwinShaftShredder #AluminiumScrap

Every Zato machine begins and ends its journey in the warehouse—where Andrea, Fabio and Valter are always ready to deliver.

From receiving raw materials to preparing shipments of finished machines, they keep operations smooth, fast and perfectly coordinated.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingSolutions #ZatoTeam

At Zato, we believe every material deserves a second chance, and that every action can spark transformation. Each plant we design brings us closer to a circular future — one that values resources, reduces impact, and empowers industries to move forward responsibly.

Because recycling isn’t just a process — it’s a commitment we live by.
Happy World Recycling Day.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #WorldRecyclingDay

Zato is live at Recycled Materials Association 2025 — and ready to meet you! Join us in San Diego until May 15 at booth 415 and explore our solutions for metal recycling.
Our experts are ready to discuss your challenges and help you find the right Zato equipment to drive your operations forward. Don’t miss this opportunity — visit us!
we_are_rema 
#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #ReMA2025

Can a single shredder boost output, cut costs, and enhance safety all at once?

The answer comes from cozzi_recycling in Chicago, where our Blue Devil shredder has delivered real, measurable results — from optimising breaker performance to streamlining operations.

Curious to learn more? Read the full case study and discover how Zato makes the difference. 👉 link in bio 

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #BlueDevil #TwinShaftShredder

This June, Zato will be present at leading recycling events across Europe.

From Germany to Spain and France, our team of experts will be on-site to share valuable insights, present our latest technological advancements, and support you in identifying the ideal solutions for your scrap metal processing challenges.

Swipe through the carousel to see our full event calendar — and let’s meet in person!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #MRYE2025 #FER2025 #ARI #JournéePartenaire

We’ve landed in Tokyo! 🇯🇵

ZATO is live at N-EXPO 2025 to present our smart recycling solutions for every metal recovery need.
Ferrous, non-ferrous, custom-built? We’ve got it.

Come visit us at Booth A341 — our team is ready to talk tech!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #NEXPO

Vehicles in, efficiency out.

This is what happens at one of our Czech installations, where a Zato pre-shredder processes auto scrap before the hammermill. 
It boosts performance and reduces wear — meaning less stress on the system and more value in every cycle.

Take a closer look at the results!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #PreShredder #Hammermill #BlueDevil #RecyclingEquipment

ZATO popped over to France yesterday for Journée Partenaire ARI🇫🇷

We showcased our Blue Devil twin-shaft shredder – compact, efficient, and built to take on the real challenges of scrap processing.

What makes a recycling system a ZATO system? Those who were in Saint-Victor-de-Cessieu now know the answer.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #ARI

When Europe's leading metal recovery fair calls, Zato answers.

So we’re live in Frankfurt for Metal Recycling Conference & Expo 2025, ready to show how our technology turns metal into value. From ferrous to non-ferrous, from standard to custom — we’ve got the solution.

Come meet us at Hall 12 – Stand D60!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #MRYE2025

A new era of recycling begins in Panama:
morganmetalpa inaugurated its cutting-edge facility featuring our Blue Devil Pre-Shredder and Blue Shark Shredder.

These powerful, high-efficiency solutions are designed to reduce emissions and energy consumption—while turning scrap into value.
An industrial milestone for Panama, built on innovation and sustainability.

Thank you to our team, Morgan Metal, and the Panamanian institutions for making this project a success. Welcome to a new era of recycling!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #Blueshark #BlueDevil

Three machines, one mission: efficient scrap recovery.

That’s the story behind our last installation — where mixed ferrous scrap becomes clean, sorted output thanks to Zato’s powerhouse trio: Blue Devil, Blue Shark and Blue Sorter.

From pre-shredding to final separation, it’s all about efficiency.
Discover the full setup in action and explore Zato’s smart solutions.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #BlueDevil #BlueShark #BlueSorter

Tough materials call for tougher tools—take cast iron, which can push machines to their limit, that is unless you're using the right one.

ZATO’s Cayman shears are engineered precisely to cut through even the hardest scraps with ease.

Curious? Swipe through the carousel to discover how to take on cast iron with confidence.

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment
